title: Radiola 2.05 Portable
description:
Online Radio Player And Recorder



Download, unzip and use.  It is portable.  No install and it is also totally 

free.  One of the very best radio players I have ever used!


Radiola is an Internet radio player that you can use to listen a variety of 

online radio stations. The stations are grouped by genre and there is also a 

filter option to quickly find a station by name.
You can rename the stations if you want and also edit the streaming URL or 

add your own stations to the list.
Radiola also includes a recording option that lets you record the current 

station and save each song as individual MP3 file. The recording are saved to 

your default Music folder.


Reality Ascent radio program by Dragan Glavasic
Wake up!


3:30 AM 9/24/2016
